attributes.action: All members of Parliament to have weekly, random urine tests.
attributes.background: Due to reason news, I’d like for all members of Parliament to do , weekly random, urine tests... I think like any other job we need that, kind of transparency especially since they supposedly run our country I’d/we should like to know.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/264011
